name: confidential-health-surveys
description: Privacy-preserving health survey platform using FHEVM

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/fhevm-hardhat-template && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

scripts.deploy:sepolia: cd packages/fhevm-hardhat-template && npx hardhat deploy --network sepolia
